message: ROOT CAUSE FOUND: CLAUDE_ORCHESTRATOR_WORKSPACE env var is set to literal "${workspaceFolder}/.agent-workspace" - a VSCode variable that was never expanded by the shell

EXACT SOURCE LOCATED: The literal ${workspaceFolder} string is set in Claude Code's MCP configuration (codex_mcp_connection_manager). This is where the MCP server env vars are defined, including CLAUDE_ORCHESTRATOR_WORKSPACE="${workspaceFolder}/.agent-workspace"

data.config_location: Claude Code's MCP server config (Codex/Claude Code internal)
data.issue: Claude Code/Codex is NOT expanding ${workspaceFolder} before passing to MCP server
data.resolution_needed: Either: (1) Claude Code must expand ${workspaceFolder} before passing to MCP server, OR (2) real_mcp_server.py must call resolve_workspace_variables() on WORKSPACE_BASE at initialization
